text_block_list.text: On the day of Winning Tickets debut match

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, and the both of you! Thank 
you for coming to support me～～!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it. We are partners in the same team!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It is my teammates spring stage. Even for those who could not 
come today, I will support you with all my might.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And when you're done we will have a fun dinner! Grilled 
Scallops and more scallops! Three-color rice bowl 
of crab and sea urchin with salmon roe!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Melon parfait! Don't forget about melon parfait!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: … So that's your real objective.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Wh, what are you saying!? The meal is a bonus! Anyway, now you 
should focus! concentrate!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That's right. concentrate, concentrate. 
Well then, Trainer-san, I'll be going!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! The road to the Derby begins 
from here! I will definitely win!

Winning Ticket took her first step 
towards the big dream. And thenー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaaaaa!!!! I lost～!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut up! How many more times are you going to yell that you lost?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hee… How cold～. We've been friends since we entered the school, 
you can at least comfort me～.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Even if I comfort you, you'll cry and scream anyway.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, this is the starting point for the Derby, 
right? Even though I've got a long way to go, 
I can't believe I lost at my first race.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Well, after seeing how excited you were, it's not like I don't 
know where you're coming from.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Right!? What should I do if I can't 
get in the Derby because of this?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Oh～～Geez! Even If you lose your debut game, it's not a reason you 
can't go to the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I lost my debut match too, that's why I 
think you should start looking ahead.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Right, you can start again from here. If you really want to be 
depressed, just leave it to when your dreams are broken.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wooo… Taishin's unyielding spirit! Hayahide's quiet and burning 
spirit! I can't stop here!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
If you're aiming for the Derby, you can't stop here! Thank you, 
after all, you should have a friends ～～Waaa～!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: In the end you're crying after all! Shut up, Geez!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But, this simplicity is also one of the good qualities about 
Ticket. We can't afford to lose too.
At teams training timeー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaaa～～! Derby!!!!

Usually, the training after a race is light, but Winning Ticket 
was running with all her might as if it was right before a race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wow… Ticket-san is so fired up.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I thought she would be depressed today after yesterday's race but 
she is surprisingly cheerful, this girl.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She said she was encouraged by her friends. Ticket -san has 
wonderful friends who understand her dreams.
If you are aiming for the Derby, you can't slack off.
I have to respond firmly to her who runs towards her dreams!
Tickezou! Swing your arms!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yes!!!!
Be aware of your stride! let's save the power until the end!!
Be aware of your stride! let's save the power until the end!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Stride length Waaaaaa!! Let's get out of here～～!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh… ahh… ahh. Alright, it's over! Thank you for your hard work!
Good work. Rest well, so as not to leave fatigue.
Good work. Rest well, so as not to leave fatigue.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! But, I'm thinking about running a little more.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I lost my debut match, but I was encouraged by my friends, and I 
received firm coaching from my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I mean, that loss was not in vain. My feelings 
for the Derby have grown even more!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You're one interesting girl. I don't hate people like you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To this passion, Trainer-san you have to respond too.

Of course, that's what I'm going to do. There's no trainer who 
will hold back a Horse Girl who is running towards her dream.
choice_data_list: Tickezou, your next race is next week!
Tickezou, your next race is next week!

text_block_list.text:
Of course, that's what I'm going to do. There's no trainer who 
will hold back a Horse Girl who is running towards her dream.
choice_data_list: Tickezou, your next race is next week!
Tickezou, your next race is next week!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me, it's the series race!? It's 
harder than you think, that is!!

Of course, physical condition is a priority. 
but if it's Tickezou, I'm sureー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: W… Waaaa!! I'll run!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I will hit a lot of difficult challenges towards my Derby goal! 
This means that me and the trainer are going to work together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: let's win～!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: … It seems that the trainer also has “Hot blood”.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It would be the influence of Ticket-san. It's fun to see what the 
future holds for the 2 of them.
The story of Winning Ticket that began with a lossー
But it was definitely starting to move towards the goal.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Here comes Winning Ticket! Winning Ticket 
now, first to cross the goal!
(Cheers～～～～!!)
After 2 weeks of racing, Winning Ticket won for the first time.
